service.add_details_help:
About you

Under the Data Protection Act 1998, organisations such as the BBC must ensure that any of your personal information is collected fairly and kept safely.
service.add_details_error_help:
Unwanted emails

We will never send you junk or spam email.

Some internet sites do though, so be wary when giving your email address - you might be asked if you mind receiving promotional emails or you might not be given a choice and could be sent them automatically.

Read the small print!

house_rules.rule: We advise that you don't give out your personal information or contact details to others
Keep the atmosphere friendly and be patient, people of all abilities use BBCi
We can't guarantee the content of links to non-BBCi websites, take care when clicking on them
